name: SDP - HDZ pong
description:
Free Windows .exe run & play political pong, where you collect votes for your feud, no matter on which political side. Much serious game project. :)

No AI, just for double multiplayer, or single-moving-two-pads game. :)

Originally published on 2015-05-13 via mediafire.

Controlls:

W & S - for left side

ARROWS - for right side
